column5: I have a bit of a dilemna. I just discovered recently that one of my key customers owns Hummingbird. Up until then I was almost certainly going to go Lowrance.  I know that some of you high rollers have four figure $$$$ units but I am looking for something in $500 - $700 budget.  I now know what Hummingbird makes (I understand that they have come a long way), what else is recommended in that price range and why.
